question: Need help about my penis?
question_content: if im circumcised but the skin can still move up and down below the head, like when i get a handy, can i still pleasure a girl as well as a person who has tightened skin under the head, like mine is loose i guess u can put it

answers.answer_content:
Yes, you can still pleasure a girl.  However, most men find that they and their partner get greater pleasure when the skin of the erect penis is drum tight.

You can always get a revision circumcision to tighten up your loose one.
